img.caption: Trailhead at right (east) side of Mamquam Main between 1 and 2 "up" signs
Steep cliffs ~30 min from trailhead. Traverse along the base to the right
Technical crux: awkward pull up high angle bluff
Views on 3rd peak of Stawamus Chief: Habrich ridge left, Co-Pilot distance center, Goat ridge right
Cirque of the Uncrackables on loop return via Slhaney Trail
